title: Vision of the Absolute
content:
Vision of the Absolute Uncommon 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Piercing Absolute Night: Blind targets that fail a Dexterity saving throw. Deals an additional 2-12 Piercing damage to certain creatures that sport multiple sets of eyes. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The tip of this spear, covered with horrifying barbs, strikes unerringly towards its target's eyes. Spear Thrown Versatile 1.35 330
